page.title: 14 A MUM'S DAY
page.content:
{ Mrs. C. Wildridge}describing{14/6/85
0745:Got up and made{breakfast}for family-cereal, toast and coffee. 0830:Family gone, had own breakfast then washed dishes,20 mins exercising. 0930:Made beds, general tidying in bedrooms and bathroom. 1000:Had cup of coffee, got ready to go to the shops(radio on,{Radio 4). 1130:Did ironing. 1310:Had{lunch. 1330-1600:General cleaning of house. 1630:Made coffee, cooked & served{tea 1800:Shopped for groceries for 2 wks. 1930:Washed up, relaxed (cup of tea) 2000:Cleared table & tidied up. 2030:Got children ready for bed. Stephen at Scouts,got his supper ready 2130:Watched TV, relaxed. Supper with a glass of Sherry. 2330:Tidied up,put out milkbottles,bed
